page.title: 16GRANGE FARM
page.content: Grange farm is owned by Mr.Mack.He owns about 600 acres but only 400 is used for farming;the other 200 acres is deciduous woodland.The crops he grows are:wheat,barley,potatoes,sugar beet,peas,forage maze and grass.He keeps cattle which are sold for beef. His farmhouse was built in the late 1500's.It was formly two seperate cottages,but was joined together later.The main entrance hall was built recently,with other modern buildings. It was bought by his mother in 1921. Mr.Mack employs five farmworkers,who work about 12 hours a day.Mr.Mack is happy farming in Norfolk,and the ground around him is drained marshland which is good for farming.
